task.title: Contacting IBM StoredIQ customer support
task.shortdesc: For IBM StoredIQ technical support or to learn about available service options, contact IBM StoredIQ customer support at this phone number:

taskbody.result: Or, see the Contact IBM web site at http://www.ibm.com/contact/us/.
taskbody.postreq: The IBM StoredIQ documentation is available in IBM Knowledge Center.
